REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Abandoned child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a quick witted, funny child. One day, [PAWN_pronoun] wandered off on [PAWN_possessive] wealthy genetic parents, and was ultimately lost in a supposedly unused ore warehouse. Due to cloning technology, [PAWN_possessive] parents decided that the time looking for [PAWN_objective] was better spent on just cloning a better child.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Abductee
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abducted by xenohumans when [PAWN_pronoun] was still a baby. They experimented on [PAWN_objective] to understand [PAWN_possessive] genetic structure. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew up, [PAWN_nameDef] grew a little bit too big and strong for [PAWN_possessive] captors and eventually escaped.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Academy student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] went to school like a good space cadet would. [PAWN_pronoun] was very tall and was known for [PAWN_possessive] good looks. Though [PAWN_pronoun] worried more about [PAWN_possessive] hairstyle than [PAWN_possessive] grades, [PAWN_pronoun] still somehow passed the final exams.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Adventuring child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised to become an engineer. For years, [PAWN_pronoun] planned to stow away on a cargo ship and start a new, more adventuresome life. One night, after [PAWN_possessive] parents fell asleep, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to sneak on board a cargo ship just before it left port.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Amateur astronomer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was fascinated with astronomy. [PAWN_pronoun] would spend hours gazing at planets and nebulae through [PAWN_possessive] telescope. [PAWN_pronoun] is credited with discovering a small comet that would, years later, strike a nearby moon and disrupt the mining operations there.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Amateur botanist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Spending many summers crawling through dirt, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_pronoun] had quite the green thumb. Instead of learning to cook the food [PAWN_pronoun] grew, [PAWN_pronoun] just grew more and more.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Amateur engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a family with a military and engineering background. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to join the army but [PAWN_possessive] father didn't like the idea, so [PAWN_possessive] interest turned to great flying machines and works of engineering. [PAWN_pronoun] secretly hoped that this would one day lead [PAWN_objective] to a life of galactic exploration.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Apocalypse child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood on a post-apocalyptic world. [PAWN_pronoun] fought for survival from a young age, on a planet where trust did not exist. [PAWN_pronoun] told everyone that [PAWN_pronoun] had no luck.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Apprentice smith
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up helping in [PAWN_possessive] father's smithy. They were some of the last smiths on the planet to use traditional smithing methods. They even collect some materials themselves. Sometimes, after work, [PAWN_nameDef] would practice using the swords [PAWN_pronoun] forged.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Aristocrat
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into an aristocratic family, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] younger years in blissful ignorance. [PAWN_possessive] studies were sporadic and [PAWN_pronoun] never took a liking to anything involving [PAWN_possessive] hands. Fate, however, would force a change in habit. A global war broke out and the nukes melted the planet's surface into radioactive glass.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Artful dodger
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on one of the urbworlds and had to fend for [PAWN_objective]self all [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] never trusted anyone, relying on [PAWN_possessive] persuasiveness and cunning to survive. [PAWN_pronoun] soon became skilled with firearms and knives as well as words.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Artisan farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a [PAWN_possessive] family's glitterworld farm. They were one of the last farms on the planet that preferred traditional farming methods to glitterworld technology.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Aspergers rebel
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as a rebel on an formerly-advanced rimworld devastated by war. [PAWN_possessive] Aspergers syndrome meant [PAWN_pronoun] struggled with social situations and was incapable of caring, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned hard skills like research and shooting very quickly.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Aspiring engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a fascination with gadgets and gizmos. [PAWN_pronoun] took apart and put together almost anything [PAWN_pronoun] could find. [PAWN_pronoun] got used to repairing toys brought to [PAWN_objective] by other children, and even fixed a few devices from [PAWN_possessive] elders.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Aspiring pop idol
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was being trained in song and dance to become the next big pop idol. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up being taken care of by company handlers. [PAWN_pronoun] never knew manual labor, but learned a lot about music and social etiquette.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Athlete
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was professional athlete at early age. Thanks to [PAWN_possessive] skills, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to leave [PAWN_possessive] homeworld and enroll in a glitterworld university of science and technology. Because of [PAWN_possessive] demanding schedule and introverted nature, [PAWN_pronoun] became socially inept.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Awkward nerd
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Always fascinated by machines, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] time studying robotics and holography. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred the company of [PAWN_possessive] scientific creations to that of other people.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Blackjack player
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The only useful skill [PAWN_nameDef] learned from [PAWN_possessive] tough military school was card counting. [PAWN_pronoun] amassed many enemies by cheating at casinos, becoming ever more edgy and violent as the threat of retaliation grew. When [PAWN_pronoun] was finally caught, they burned half [PAWN_possessive] skin off. He'll never be able to face fire or violence again.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Blessed child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born under auspicious circumstances to a midworld spiritual group and held in reverence throughout [PAWN_possessive] childhood. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to take care of the poor and give succor to the faithful from an early age.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bone collector
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a family of fortune hunters, [PAWN_nameDef] always had a passion for ancient history. Though never a tough or social child, [PAWN_pronoun] loved to dig through history books as well as dirt piles.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bookworm
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth in the library, reading every book [PAWN_pronoun] could about the technical marvels of space travel, the engineering ingenuity of the space-faring pioneers, and the horrible yet fascinating tales of the mechanoid races. [PAWN_pronoun] vowed that one day, [PAWN_pronoun] would see these things for [PAWN_objective]self.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Brothel gofer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a steam-powered midworld wracked by a century of economic crises, [PAWN_nameDef] went to work at a young age. Scrounging, shoe-polishing, sewing - [PAWN_pronoun] did it all. But [PAWN_pronoun] was most known as a brothel gofer, delivering all manner of aphrodisiacs and chemicals to the girls' rooms.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravan child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a urbworld merchant ship to an entrepreneurial mother and an absent father.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravan traveler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a nomadic family of caravan traders on a rim world. [PAWN_possessive] father, the caravan leader, taught [PAWN_objective] the caravan trade. Because [PAWN_pronoun] was able to barter or hunt for all of [PAWN_possessive] food, [PAWN_pronoun] never had to worry about doing any farm work. Later, [PAWN_possessive] father retired to a farm and offered [PAWN_nameDef] the position of caravan leader.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravan traveler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a family of traveling merchants, [PAWN_nameDef] was mentored by [PAWN_possessive] father in the ways of being a trader. [PAWN_pronoun] was often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Due to [PAWN_possessive] nomadic lifestyle, [PAWN_pronoun] hunted and bartered for [PAWN_possessive] food.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cat herder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped out in [PAWN_possessive] father's cat breeding business, socializing, herding, and feeding hundreds of cats. When [PAWN_pronoun] refused to clean up after the cats, [PAWN_pronoun] was transferred to the breeding science division.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child chemist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A midworld child, [PAWN_nameDef] was fixated on finding out exactly how everything worked. [PAWN_pronoun] collected rare objects and performed dangerous experiments on them. Delving deeper into these experiments, [PAWN_pronoun] became isolated from the rest of the world. [PAWN_pronoun] only left [PAWN_possessive] research area to collect more materials.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child of glass
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised underground on a "marble" planet - a wasteland of radioactive asphalt and toxic fallout. To survive on a planet devoid of life, [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn how to farm underground and how to fight without wasting bullets.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a poor family on a rimworld. [PAWN_possessive] father sold [PAWN_objective] into slavery at a young age and [PAWN_pronoun] was traded many times. A tycoon bought [PAWN_objective] as part of a child labor force and sent down into mines to look after machines and to work alongside them.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child-knave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a child-knave of King Loteric. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed the training with wooden sticks and engaging others in close combat. [PAWN_pronoun] adapted quickly to the heat of battle and was good at spreading fire. [PAWN_pronoun] served [PAWN_possessive] lord well, until the king died in an unfortunate accident.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child of a huntress
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the mountains of the planet Ticonderoga, [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by [PAWN_possessive] tribal mother. She taught [PAWN_objective] survival skills - trapping, tracking, shooting, skinning, cooking and healing. [PAWN_possessive] departed father had left behind an old bolt-action rifle, and [PAWN_nameDef] practiced with it every chance [PAWN_pronoun] got.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Circus performer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in the circus, [PAWN_nameDef] learned a lot of interesting things. More interesting then the balls [PAWN_pronoun] juggled were the pockets [PAWN_pronoun] picked between shows. A mistake with some firesticks made [PAWN_objective] develop a deathly fear of fire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Class clown
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the ultra-competitive environs of [PAWN_possessive] glitterworld school, [PAWN_nameDef] always offered to play the class clown to diffuse tension. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a sense of social desperation from this, as well as an appreciation for the artistic side of comedy.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Coliseum cleaner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: During the "Inner Destrian War" fallout, [PAWN_possessive] parents were captured and [PAWN_pronoun] was born into a life of slavery. Forced to clean coliseums after bloody battles for money. Watching, waiting, and learning. Coliseums were the only thing [PAWN_pronoun] ever knew. One night while cleaning the coliseum, [PAWN_possessive] family was murdered.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Colony kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born the child of two doctors in a small colony. Because of [PAWN_possessive] parents, [PAWN_pronoun] was always interested in science and medicine. [PAWN_nameDef] never really got along with other children, and as a result became withdrawn and unsociable.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Construction grunt
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in [PAWN_possessive] father's lab, [PAWN_nameDef] was given the life of an intellectual elite. [PAWN_pronoun] got everything [PAWN_pronoun] desired, and price was never an object. However, [PAWN_nameDef] did not partake in the luxury given to [PAWN_objective]. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] pursued more physical, and - in [PAWN_possessive] father's eyes - lower-class jobs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Core dilettante
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] formative years on a glitterworld in the core region, where [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] friends pursued lives of idle pleasure. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew up, [PAWN_pronoun] began to find the life of ease unfulfilling. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to look for a more challenging path.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Core world student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never fit in well with the other children, preferring creative pursuits, such as crafting jewelry, over sports.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Crime boss' child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was adopted child of a notorious crime boss. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught all facets of the family business, from smuggling to inventive ways of killing. When the family was attacked, [PAWN_possessive] father ordered [PAWN_objective] to hide in a secret longsleep crypt.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Diplomat's child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in diplomatic family. Travelling often, [PAWN_pronoun] was home-schooled and saw the world mostly through a computer.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Disaster survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was uprooted when marauders attacked [PAWN_possessive] family farm, destroying machinery and killing farmhands and beasts alike. After the death of all [PAWN_pronoun] knew, [PAWN_pronoun] was left in the ruins to fend for [PAWN_objective]self.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Disciplined farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the younger of two children on the family farm, a frontier plot that struggled to turn a profit. [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a strict disciplinarian, constantly at [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] sibling to work harder and keep quiet. [PAWN_nameDef] burnt [PAWN_possessive] hand making breakfast once and swore to cook only when [PAWN_possessive] life was in danger.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Displaced noble
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on an urbworld to the ruler of three megacities, [PAWN_nameDef]'s prospects looked good - until a violent insurrection overthrew [PAWN_possessive] family. Exile introduced [PAWN_nameDef] to hard work and combat, but some high-born squeamishness remains.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Drudge
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was never sure what [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to do with [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time doing low-wage jobs and wondering what [PAWN_possessive] future would be like. [PAWN_pronoun] entertained [PAWN_objective]self with space sims and survival games, dreaming of one day being somewhere more interesting.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Earth colonist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on Earth. As a child, [PAWN_pronoun] was launched into space as part of an interstellar colonization program.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Factory worker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a large factory city on an industrial world. Since poverty was rampant and food scarce, [PAWN_pronoun] worked for whatever wages [PAWN_pronoun] could get. This wasn't an easy life, but [PAWN_nameDef] never shied away from a hard day's work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farm child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on [PAWN_possessive] family's farm, looking after the animals and treating them when they were injured. Preferring hands-on tasks and the outdoors, [PAWN_pronoun] avoided softer jobs that might have kept [PAWN_objective] cooped up inside. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed this lonely work, and tended to stay out of people's way and do [PAWN_possessive] own thing.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farm kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on [PAWN_possessive] family's beef farm. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed working the fields and taking care of the animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farm mechanic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on a farming planet, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] time learning about the automated machinery that grew and harvested the multitude of crops.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farmer child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents died in a fire when [PAWN_pronoun] was seven. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up on [PAWN_possessive] uncle's farm, plowing fields and doing manual labor. [PAWN_pronoun] could not bear answering questions about [PAWN_possessive] parents, so [PAWN_pronoun] replaced social contact with hard work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Feral child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abandoned on an animal planet as a small child with nought but a blanket with a name embroidered on it, [PAWN_nameDef] made [PAWN_objective]self one with the wilderness. When [PAWN_pronoun] was 13, [PAWN_pronoun] encountered a team of mineral surveyors, who "offered" [PAWN_objective] passage off of the planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Feudal farm kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a medieval farmer, and was expected to follow in his footsteps. [PAWN_pronoun] was brought up as a kind, well trained farm kid. [PAWN_pronoun] lived in an unusual feudal kingdom which co-existed with a midworld society which was itself well-known for genetic manipulation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fire-scarred child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an active child who lived an uneventful childhood until [PAWN_pronoun] fell into a fire and suffered horrific burns to [PAWN_possessive] hands and arms. Although the scars have faded, [PAWN_pronoun] can't bear to be in close proximity to fire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Foundry apprentice
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as an apprentice in the foundries of an industrial world. This experience gave [PAWN_objective] metalworking skills and strong muscles, but stunted [PAWN_possessive] artistic development.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Frontier marshal
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] inherited a sense of duty from [PAWN_possessive] father, and began a law enforcement career on [PAWN_possessive] frontier homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] tried to uphold the law with honor, but the corruption and greed of local government officials often discouraged [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gang member
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up homeless on an urbworld. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to fight and struggle for everything, making [PAWN_objective] hard and ruthless long before adulthood. [PAWN_nameDef] would have stayed in those streets, had [PAWN_pronoun] not been injured in a shootout and had [PAWN_possessive] body confiscated for use by one of the worldwide city's ruling corporations.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The child of genetically-engineered "perfect mates" on a glitterworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was much more shy, withdrawn and nervous than [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_pronoun] kept mostly to [PAWN_objective]self, studying science and medicine and taking on gardening as a hobby. In [PAWN_possessive] teens, [PAWN_pronoun] ran away from home, seeking a quieter life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gun kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in a urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] never had it easy. Every day was a struggle and pollution, hunger, and gangs of older kids. In the little space [PAWN_pronoun] had to [PAWN_objective]self, [PAWN_pronoun] studied [PAWN_possessive] passion - guns, combat tactics, and war history.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hacker kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a high-tech world, [PAWN_nameDef] learned hack computers at a young age. Spending many hours tinkering alone made [PAWN_objective] very good with machines, but very bad with humans.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Headjack addict
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Plugged in to the computer via head-jack for days at a time, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_pronoun] preferred the company of computers to that of people or pets.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hex-cell artist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] crafted sculptures from spent hex-cells and traded them to a local museum for food. After [PAWN_possessive] popularity grew, [PAWN_pronoun] was approached by a pirate and abducted. The pirate kept [PAWN_objective] prisoner and forced [PAWN_objective] to create sculptures for sale.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hillbilly prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a cold hillbilly planet inhabited mainly by furred xenohumans, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up to the sound of bar fights and shootouts. Though [PAWN_possessive] childhood was spent playing the banjo and working as a mechanic, [PAWN_possessive] abnormal intelligence made [PAWN_objective] want something more; [PAWN_pronoun] entered medical school at age twenty.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: History student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] spent learned many artistic forms including music and novel writing. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew older, [PAWN_pronoun] began to study legends from [PAWN_possessive] home world - legends of the lizard-like beings at the center of [PAWN_possessive] culture's folklore.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hive world child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had an isolated upbringing in an urbworld hive city. [PAWN_possessive] hatred of heights kept [PAWN_objective] indoors often, and made [PAWN_objective] an introverted child. When [PAWN_pronoun] did go out onto the catwalks of the city, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed playing war games, becoming proficient with various simulation weapons.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Ice planet child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on the frozen wastes of an ocean moon, [PAWN_nameDef] only had animals and a few hard-bitten sailors as companions. The lack of social interaction made [PAWN_objective] develop a interest in engineering - but [PAWN_pronoun] never developed any great fondness for humans.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Idealistic cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised in the military traditions of [PAWN_possessive] forefathers, [PAWN_nameDef] was taught from a young age that [PAWN_pronoun] would be a great leader and the hero of [PAWN_possessive] family. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled at [PAWN_possessive] studies and graduated from the academy with honors.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Imperial student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied on an imperial midworld where guns were banned and self-defense study was encouraged. The relative safety allowed [PAWN_objective] to focus on [PAWN_possessive] botanical research.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Lab-grown child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a laboratory as part of a altruistic but failed attempt to create a new class of human. [PAWN_possessive] childhood was filled with books and one-on-one tutoring. [PAWN_pronoun] was awkward, shy, and naive to the true nature of humanity.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mad scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up miserable on the plains of a neolithic planet. [PAWN_pronoun] found the strength to fight under the teachings of an old, broken scientist. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly learned to play with people's fears, and was nicknamed "mad scientist."

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanoid hacker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The only child of a well respected mechanoid inventor, [PAWN_nameDef] had access to the materials to subvert and modify [PAWN_possessive] father's creations. [PAWN_pronoun] used drugs to increase [PAWN_possessive] productivity. Unfortunately, the side-effects included persistent delusions of being mechanized, which limited [PAWN_possessive] social life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanoid nerd
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in an urbworld as the only child of a pair of mechanoid designers. They encouraged [PAWN_possessive] interest in the machines. Eventually, [PAWN_pronoun] became obsessed with building [PAWN_possessive] own. Unfortunately this also lead to [PAWN_objective] being a loner as [PAWN_pronoun] prefered technical books to friends.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medical student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a glitterworld in a family of doctors and chose to maintain the tradition. [PAWN_pronoun] had few friends, but got along with [PAWN_possessive] siblings very well.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medical student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into a long line of doctors, [PAWN_nameDef] was tutored in all fields of medicine, from herbal ointments to the modern synthetic drugs. [PAWN_pronoun] also picked up a healthy disdain for lower class work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval plower
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on a planet where kings and queens ruled with little regard for the peasants beneath them. [PAWN_possessive] family owned a large farm, but the king took most of the food it produced. This left [PAWN_nameDef]'s family poor, and unable to pay for [PAWN_possessive] education. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] was required to work the fields with [PAWN_possessive] parents, and never had time to practice creativity.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into slavery, [PAWN_nameDef] never knew [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually escaped from [PAWN_possessive] masters and boarded a military cargo ship, where [PAWN_pronoun] was pressed into military service.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval squire
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a medieval planet as a knight in training. [PAWN_pronoun] trained directly under the king's war adviser for most of [PAWN_possessive] youth, and learned to fight with a sword and shield.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval thief
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up poor and hungry on a medieval planet, learning to fend for [PAWN_objective]self. At first, [PAWN_pronoun] only took what [PAWN_pronoun] needed. Then [PAWN_pronoun] learned to take what [PAWN_pronoun] wanted.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary recruit
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Descended from a long line of off-world mercenaries, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a busy trading hub. [PAWN_possessive]'s interest in the foreign goods at the market often distracted [PAWN_objective] from [PAWN_possessive] chores and training.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary recruit
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a long line of off-world mercenaries, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a busy trading hub. At a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] was recruited into one of the mercenary crews.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Midworld loner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a sparsely-populated midworld, [PAWN_nameDef] had a few friends. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to pursue [PAWN_possessive] passions in solitude, whether it be tinkering with [PAWN_possessive] motorbike, watching lengthy vidcasts about the hottest new tech, or lining up [PAWN_possessive] figurines and shooting them down with [PAWN_possessive] pellet gun.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a family with a rich military background. [PAWN_possessive] teenage years were spent traveling system to system wherever [PAWN_possessive] parents were deployed. [PAWN_pronoun] enlisted at age 18, following the tradition of [PAWN_possessive] family.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military trainee
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on a military base in the Xennoa system. [PAWN_pronoun] was exposed to many different strenuous activities and grew strong at an early age. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned negotiation, medical, and military tactics.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Naturalist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a backwater planet with minimal education. [PAWN_pronoun] had to hunt and grow food to survive. [PAWN_possessive] family's home was frequently raided for food by scavengers. This made [PAWN_nameDef] very suspicious and slow to trust anyone [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't know.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Noble ward
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was adopted by a prominent noble family after being left on their doorstep by [PAWN_possessive] mother. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly learned secrets that passed between the nobles like cheap wine - of worlds beyond [PAWN_possessive] own, languages, cultures and technologies both new and old.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Optimistic child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was blessed with loving parents and a pleasant midworld life. [PAWN_pronoun] was an optimistic and sociable kid who loved making friends and listening to their stories. [PAWN_possessive] imagination would run wild with ideas and questions.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Orphan of war
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] family and home early in life. [PAWN_possessive] life became emotionally hollow, but [PAWN_possessive] painful memories drove [PAWN_objective] to survive. [PAWN_pronoun] took several jobs, but never achieved more than a basic education.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Orphan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a deep space station, [PAWN_nameDef] was orphaned at a young age. In the orphanage, [PAWN_pronoun] stood up for the weaker kids and fought off the bullies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pampered
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a decadent glitterworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was given every expensive toy. This pampered lifestyle caused [PAWN_objective] to miss many basic life lessons. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a special aversion to cooking, and always ordered the staff to do the kitchen work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pickpocket
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] witnessed [PAWN_possessive] parents' murder at a young age. With no guidance, [PAWN_pronoun] had to fend for [PAWN_objective]self any way possible. Joining a small group of misfits [PAWN_pronoun] did whatever was necessary to survive.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Privileged prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was recognized as gifted early in [PAWN_possessive] glitterworld upbringing. Luckily, [PAWN_possessive] family was in a position to cultivate that genius through advanced education. [PAWN_possessive] training included science, leadership, and the arts.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Psychology student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] researched new religions and traditions and often dreamt of distant stars. [PAWN_possessive] dreams prompted [PAWN_objective] to ask what lay beyond the lights in the sky.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Punk
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood selling knockoff cigarettes to 15-year-olds. The cigarettes were often full of grass clippings.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Rebel slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into corporate slavery and raised to perform menial tasks for minimum pay. [PAWN_pronoun] was just another cog in the machine. [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_possessive] freedom by joining a rebel organization whose goal was to break free from their corporate masters.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Re-educated youth
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on a midworld where the government cared about the youth. [PAWN_pronoun] was one of the many children who were taken from their parents and forced into the new education programs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Scavenger
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in one of the few remaining cities on a world ravaged by nuclear war. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own in this post-apocalyptic wasteland by scavenging for technology and supplies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Scout
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved being outdoors. [PAWN_possessive] parents enrolled [PAWN_objective] in a program that taught military scouting skills. [PAWN_pronoun] thrived when [PAWN_pronoun] was left alone in the wilderness. Due to this upbringing, however, [PAWN_nameDef] did not learn the basic technological skills that are taken for granted by many others.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sentimental child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a nice child. When anybody had a problem, [PAWN_pronoun] tried to fix it. But, being a child, [PAWN_pronoun] did not always succeed. This hurt [PAWN_possessive] sensitive soul. [PAWN_pronoun] dreamed of being a soldier who fights raiders and aliens.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Ship technician
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an apprentice technician on trade ships plying their routes between the stations and planets of [PAWN_possessive] home system. In this job, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to fix and improve many machines. Sometimes, [PAWN_possessive] ship was assigned to short exploratory jaunts into dangerous regions of space.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Shunned child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a small, poor family. [PAWN_pronoun] was bullied relentlessly, beaten and hated. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew up [PAWN_pronoun] developed an interest in guns. [PAWN_pronoun] usually studied from books, but occasionally managed to get some practice time with the real thing. [PAWN_nameDef] later discovered a talent for art and began to teach [PAWN_objective]self how to draw and paint.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Slave farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abandoned as a young child, [PAWN_nameDef] was found by a farmer. Being infertile himself, the farmer kept [PAWN_nameDef] as a slave. The constant beatings left [PAWN_objective] scarred and unable to handle violence. After many years, [PAWN_pronoun] ran away.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on a rural farm-world leaves little opportunity for excitement and adventure, so when the Royal Fleet began a recruiting program on [PAWN_possessive] home planet, [PAWN_nameDef] threw down [PAWN_possessive] hoe and cattle prod to took up arms for the crown. [PAWN_pronoun] served on the interplanetary super-destroyer HMS Thunder-Child.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space fan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] dreamed of space travel. [PAWN_pronoun] built [PAWN_possessive] own pretend spaceship from an old police box and went to see the great unknown.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Spoiled child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up the child of an industrious colony manager. In this position, most manual and dangerous tasks were forbidden by [PAWN_possessive] parents, but on the rim everyone has to dirty their hands.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Squire
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a noble family on a medieval world, [PAWN_nameDef] became a squire. [PAWN_possessive] training involved falconry, fencing, and wrestling - often done wearing armor. In battle, [PAWN_possessive] job was to ensure that the knights were taken care of and their armor was well-polished.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Stablehand
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a stablehand on a medieval planet, mucking dung almost every day to earn [PAWN_possessive] keep. By the time [PAWN_pronoun] was exiting childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] had saved up enough money to pay a space trader to take [PAWN_objective] offworld.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Star squire
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a medieval word, [PAWN_nameDef]'s first memory is of gazing up into the night's sky. Ever since, [PAWN_pronoun] dreamed of squiring for a knight amidst the star-filled heavens. [PAWN_possessive] focus on that vision left [PAWN_objective] somewhat single-minded.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Starforce cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised on Amen-Ti, glitterworld capital of the Star Empire, [PAWN_nameDef] had an easy childhood. As a youth, [PAWN_nameDef] decided that joining the Starforce would be [PAWN_possessive] way of giving back to the Empire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Straggler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Despite being blessed with parental love, [PAWN_nameDef] hardly knew [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_pronoun] was frequently left to [PAWN_possessive] own devices which meant more time devoted to exploring [PAWN_possessive] interests... and getting into trouble.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Street child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s drug addict mother died, leaving [PAWN_objective] an orphan at a young age. To stay alive, [PAWN_pronoun] resorted to theft, and when necessary, prostitution. When [PAWN_nameDef] was caught stealing from a church, the priestess saw a wounded but smart child, and took [PAWN_objective] in to give [PAWN_objective] a second chance at life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Street urchin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a poor family on an urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned on the streets at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to steal and kill to survive the ruthless streets, gaining skills in melee and ranged combat. There was little time for talk in [PAWN_possessive] life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Student engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A genius child, [PAWN_nameDef] was put in a special training program covering aerospace warfare and engineering. One day, [PAWN_pronoun] tried to befriend a squirrel by giving it a bracelet. The squirrel bit [PAWN_objective], earning [PAWN_objective] the nickname "Squirrel." [PAWN_nameDef] came to believe that work involving manual labor is beneath [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Student socialite
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned politics in an elite training school for socially gifted students on Kalthas IV. While [PAWN_pronoun] was naturally adept at reading and manipulating people, [PAWN_pronoun] found no joy in it. [PAWN_pronoun] left the academy several years before graduation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied chemistry and quantum mechanics for entertainment. [PAWN_pronoun] was very good at convincing others to do [PAWN_possessive] physical work, and made it a goal in life to avoid manual labor.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tech scholar
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a youth scholar of the world of science and technology. [PAWN_pronoun] strived every day to expand [PAWN_possessive] intellectual abilities.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Test subject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Test subject #11,529,914 of experiment #56,048 spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood in white rooms performing mental and physical tests. [PAWN_possessive] only companion was a voice that called itself Mother. Mother rewarded success with praise - and failure with harsh punishment.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tinkerer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a scrap-heap of a planet - the garbage dump of other planets in the system. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to make new machines from the dead parts of old ones. With some friends, [PAWN_pronoun] eventually escaped on a salvaged and repaired ship.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Toxic child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on an Industrial planet, [PAWN_nameDef] started working in a chemical plant at the age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left [PAWN_objective] mentally scarred. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually blew up the facility and escaped the planet in a stolen cargo ship.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Traders' child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a family of nomadic traders, making a living from selling and buying goods on many worlds. [PAWN_nameDef] learned the customs and methods of trade of many cultures by participating in [PAWN_possessive] parents' business.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Traumatized youth
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on a pleasant midworld. [PAWN_possessive] prosthophobe mother fell sick with heart disease. In desperation, [PAWN_nameDef]'s father abducted innocent people and harvested their hearts. [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was arrested, but the child remained scarred from the experience.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Upper urbworlder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a privileged childhood on a major urbworld. Living in an apartment far above the dense poverty of the city, [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time reading or drawing the cityscape [PAWN_pronoun] saw through [PAWN_possessive] window.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld army brat
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on an urbworld military base. [PAWN_pronoun] was too young to fight, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned to make [PAWN_objective]self useful in other ways. [PAWN_pronoun] became familiar with guns and military equipment, but never really got in touch with the natural world.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld criminal
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into bad circumstance on an overpopulated urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] turned to small-time crime as a way to avoid starvation and hypothermia. Robbery and murder were daily activities for [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_nameDef] learned that surviving was winning.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld hooligan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a dangerous urbworld. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly learned how to get [PAWN_possessive] daily meal - by crime. Such means left little to no space for cooking and growing activities.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld urchin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the darkest slums of [PAWN_possessive] urban homeworld. Neglected by [PAWN_possessive] mother, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own, battling for every scrap of food [PAWN_pronoun] saw. Eventually, as [PAWN_possessive] talents exceeded [PAWN_possessive] peers, [PAWN_pronoun] ascended from the depths to the surface streets and left [PAWN_possessive] mother behind.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was not made as a person, but a cold hearted assassin. [PAWN_pronoun] was bio-engineered by scientists, and trained as a killer. [PAWN_pronoun] was bred to have no emotion, no feelings, and no care for who lives, and who dies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown medic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised to be a combat medic, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in firearms as well as medicine. [PAWN_possessive] favorite phrase when coming upon a wounded soldier was "Life or death?" Most chose life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was vat-grown as a slave in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, [PAWN_pronoun] was taught only to cook, clean and serve [PAWN_possessive] masters. For most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood, [PAWN_pronoun] knew nothing else.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Video gamer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a glitterworld. Everything [PAWN_pronoun] wanted came to [PAWN_objective]. In school [PAWN_pronoun] was a social butterfly. At home, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time looking up the newest gadgets and playing [PAWN_possessive] favourite video games.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Video gamer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a midworld, mostly locked in [PAWN_possessive] room, playing video games. [PAWN_pronoun] was warm-hearted, with a deep fondness for animals. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew up, [PAWN_pronoun] turned to drugs to enhance [PAWN_possessive] reality. During these trying times [PAWN_pronoun] found passion and refuge in the gym.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Voyager child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on an R&D starship, and spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood travelling through the void. Approaching a mysterious planetoid, the ship was severely damaged. [PAWN_possessive] next memory is of the ship heading out of orbit, fully repaired. [PAWN_pronoun] soon developed an unnatural gift for technological research.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: VR addict
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a VR head - someone who is permanently jacked into the virtual gaming universe by [PAWN_possessive] spinal plug. [PAWN_pronoun] moved through [PAWN_possessive] daily tasks barely aware of the physical reality around [PAWN_objective]. This left [PAWN_objective] nearly unable to socialize.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wild child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned on a toxic world overgrown with hostile plant life. [PAWN_pronoun] became accustomed early to the cold burn of loneliness. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to fight, but ate [PAWN_possessive] food raw and uncooked.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Work camp slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as a slave to a particularly nasty noble family on a medieval world. While [PAWN_pronoun] received no formal education, the harsh labor regimen made [PAWN_possessive] body strong.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: World slider
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by a world-hopping band of criminals. [PAWN_pronoun] learned not to leave evidence of [PAWN_possessive] presence in case the group had to leave in a hurry. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned about medicine and hand-to-hand combat from [PAWN_possessive] fellow criminals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Youth soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a long line of soldiers. [PAWN_pronoun] followed that heritage, joining a military training program. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in all physical training programs in [PAWN_possessive] Marine course, and even passed most of the intellectual exams. While [PAWN_pronoun] was never particularly bright or nimble, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the value of hard work and suffering.
